attributes.action: Prevent those aged 65+ from making decisions concerning younger generations
attributes.additional_details: Before the EU referendum, those aged over 60 were the most likely group to want to leave the EU according to polls. The areas that scored the highest anti-EU votes during the referendum are also the areas with the highest pensioner populace, whilst a higher percentage of the younger population voted remain- those that the result will have the most significant impact on due to the fact that it will continue throughout our lifetime.
attributes.background: It is unfair that people who may not even be affected by the consequences are able to have power over others' lives and make decisions that greatly influence the youth.

rejection.details: You could start a new petition asking clearly for the specific action you want to see - for example, a change to the rules on who is eligible to vote or stand for election.
